Translations.Text: tanna sveccheyanne tanna devaragisikondavanannu nivu nodidira? Avanu tiluvalike ullavanagiddaru allahanu, avanannu darigedisi bittiruvanu mattu avana kivi hagu avana hrdayada mele mudre otti bittiruvanu mattu avana kannina mele tere elediruvanu. Allahana balika bere yaru tane avanige saridari torisaballanu? Nivenu artha madi kolluvudillave

‘‘nam'ma ihalokada badukina ace berenu illa. Navu sayutteve mattu navu badukutteve. Nam'mannu nasa maduvudu kala matra’’ endu avaru heluttare. Nijavagi avarige i kuritu yava jnanavu illa avaru kevala uhisuttiddare
nivu avarige nam'ma spastavada vacanagalannu odi kelisidaga, ‘‘nivu satyavantaragiddare nam'ma purvajarannu (jivantagolisi) tanniri’’ ennuvudaste avara vadavagiruttade

heliri; allahane nim'mannu jivantagolisuttane mattu avane nim'mannu sayisuttane. A balika nis'sandehavagi baraliruva punarut'thanada dina avane nim'mannu ottu serisaliddane. Adare heccina manavarige arivilla
akasagala hagu bhumiya adhipatyavu allahanige seride. Antima ksanavu bandu bitta dina mithyavadigalu nasta anubhavisuvaru

Andu nivu, ella samudayagalu monakaluri biddiruvudannu kanuviri. (Andu) pratiyondu samudayavannu adara karmagala dakhaleya kadege kareyalaguvudu. (Mattu helalaguvudu;) indu nimage nivu maduttidda karmagala pratiphala sigalide
idu nim'ma kuritu satyavanne heluva nam'ma dakhale. Nivu maduttidda ellavannu navu baresiduttiddevu
visvasigalagiddavarannu hagu satkarmagalannu maduttiddavarannu avara odeyanu tanna krpeyolage serisuvanu. Iduve spasta vijayavagide
atta dhikkarigalodane helalaguvudu; nimage nanna vacanagalannu odi kelisalagiralillave? Adare nivu ahankara toridiri mattu nivu aparadhigalagiddiri

‘‘allahana vagdanavu khandita satyavagide mattu antima ksanavu baruvudaralli sandehavilla endu (nim'madane) helaladaga nivu, – antima ghalige andarenendu namagenu tiliyadu, navu adannu kevala ondu bhrame endu pariganisutteve mattu navantu nambuvavaralla – ennuttiddiri’’
avaru madidda papakrtyagalu avara munde prakatavagi biduvavu mattu yavudannu avaru geli maduttiddaro aduve (a sikseye) avarannu avarisikolluvudu
mattu avarodane helalaguvudu; ‘‘nivu i dinada bhetiyannu maretiddante indu navu nim'mannu maretu bittiruvevu. Narakave nim'ma neleyagide mattu nimage sahayakaru yaru illa’’

‘‘idekendare, nivu allahana vacanagalannu geli maduttiddiri mattu ihalokada baduku nim'mannu mosagolisittu’’. Indu avarige illinda hora hogalikku sadhyavilla mattu avanannu (allahanannu) meccisalikku avakasavilla
allahanige krtajnategalu. Avane akasagala odeyanu bhumiya odeyanu sarva lokagala odeyanu agiruvanu
akasagalallu bhumiyallu hirimeyu avanige seride. Avanu prabalanu yuktivantanu agiddane
(Satyavannu) dhikkarisidavara hagu allahana margadinda (janarannu) tadedavara karmagalella vyarthavagi bittavu

mattu satyadalli nambike ittu satkarmagalannu madidavaru hagu muham'madarige ilisi kodalagiruva sandesavu tam'ma odeyana kadeyinda (banda) satyavendu nambidavaru – avara papagalannu avanu (allahanu) pariharisidanu mattu avara sthitiyannu sudharisidanu
ekendare, dhikkarigalu mithyavannu anusarisidaru hagu visvasigalu tam'ma odeyana kadeyinda banda satyavannu anusarisidaru. Allahanu i riti manavarigagi udaharanegalannu mundiduttane

(yud'dhadalli) nivu dhikkarigalannu edurisidaga, koralugalannu kattarisiri. Avarannu cennagi sadebadida balika (ulidavarannu) bigiyagi katti hakiri a balika nivu (avara mele) audarya torabahudu athava parihara padeyabahudu. Yud'dhavu mugiyuva tanaka (palisabekada niyama) idu. Allahanu bayasiddare, avara virud'dha pratikara tirisuttiddanu. Adare avanu nim'malli kelavarannu matte kelavara mulaka pariksisa bayasuttane. Allahana margadalli hataradavara karmagalu vyarthavagalaravu
allahanu avarige dari torisuvanu mattu avara sthitiyannu sudharisuvanu
mattu avanu avarige paricayisiruva svargadolage avarannu serisuvanu
visvasigale, nivu allahanige neravadare allahanu nimage neravaguvanu hagu nim'ma hejjegalannu sthiragolisuvanu
dhikkarisidavarige vinasavide mattu (avanu) avara karmagalannella vyarthagolisi biduvanu
ekendare, allahanu ilisikotta sandesada kuritu avaru jigupse toridaru mattu (avanu) avara karmagalannu nirnamagolisibittanu
